japanese_title: 梟の神が自ら歌った謡「コンクワ」
japanese_translation: (1) katken......川ガラス.昔から大そういい鳥として尊ばれる鳥です.
chinese_translation: (1) katken......川玻璃。自古以來就被視為非常吉祥的鳥。
english_translation: (1) katken......River Dipper. It is a bird that has been highly respected as a very good bird since ancient times.
updated_chinese_translation: (1) katken......河烏。自古以來就被視為非常好的鳥，備受尊崇。
update_comment: The original Chinese translation is generally accurate but lacks some of the directness and clarity present in both the Japanese and English versions. Specifically, "吉祥" (auspicious) is a reasonable interpretation of "いい鳥" (good bird), but "good" in this context seems more about its inherent qualities rather than its symbolic value. The English translation captures this nuance better with "very good bird". The English translation also provides the species name "River Dipper" which is helpful. The updated translation aims to incorporate these aspects.
